name: AS_GCM_GithubSyncEnabled_v1_default
sail_code:
/*

DESCRIPTION: This rule represents whether or not GCA can connect and sync FAR clauses with 
the Acquisition.gov github repo via API

DEFAULT BEHAVIOR: GCA updates FAR clauses through the background weekly sync and
users can choose the manual sync button on individual clauses. If set to false, the sync clause button and 
the weekly sync are disabled.

CUSTOMIZATION STEPS: 
1. Replace true with false if the API should be disabled
2. the value of this expression should only be one of the two available below


EXPECTED OUTPUT TYPE: Boolean with the value of true or false

TITLE: Enable/Disable Acquisition FAR Github Sync

*/
true()
